title: Workshop on Improving Science Textbook PPT Design Using Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic PowerPoint operation skills and understanding of ChatGPT interface
context.additional_context: Short-term course for in-service elementary science teachers conducted at a corporate-affiliated training institute, with hands-on practice using individual tablets

learning_goals: Science textbook content can be restructured according to visual hierarchies using generative AI prompt engineering
Text-heavy slides can be converted into modern designs by integrating Python automation scripts with the ChatGPT API
A 3-second rule (limiting text to 3 words) can be applied to create PPTs that reduce cognitive load and tested in mobile environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
